title: Project Delivery Workflow
subtitle: From concept to completion in 5 strategic phases

steps.title: Discovery & Strategy
steps.description: Deep dive into your brand, audience, and objectives to create a strategic foundation for success.

steps.title: Concept Development
steps.description: Ideation and creative exploration to develop unique concepts that align with your strategic goals.

steps.title: Design & Production
steps.description: Transform concepts into polished assets with attention to detail and brand consistency.

steps.title: Review & Refinement
steps.description: Collaborative feedback process to ensure every detail meets your expectations and objectives.

steps.title: Final Delivery
steps.description: Complete asset package with all formats, guidelines, and ongoing support documentation.
